catalog_info.title: Theorizing Improvisation
catalog_info.description: Theorizing Improvisation.This research-oriented seminar surveys the newly emerging, interdisciplinary area of critical improvisation studies, in which recent scholarship in African diasporic music and aesthetics joins a larger conversation on improvisation across multiple research fields in the arts, the sciences, and the humanities. Through a range of published and unpublished readings, mostly from the last two decades, we examine improvisation as a central feature of individual and collective subjectivities.
